scripts.deploy: npm run build && mkdir -p pages && cp index.html pages && cp bundle.js pages && (cd pages && git init && git config user.name "Travis CI" && git config user.email "lee@leebyron.com" && git add . && git commit -m "Deploy to GitHub Pages" && git push --force --quiet "https://${GH_TOKEN}@github.com/leebyron/centerclock.git" master:gh-pages > /dev/null 2>1)
